title: Is life hard in the Faroe Islands? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have wondered this myself until I read about the horror of the Faroe islands. They have a preoccupation with torturing forms of sea mammals. I read that the sea turns red with blood. This is one place I will never visit. I doubt I would enjoy any place which promotes this type of fishing. I don’t believe a sheep’s head on the dinner table is very appealing either, not that they do this in the Faroe Islands, but why not? If they can do it to whales they might do it to sheep.
